title: The Night Dancer
info:
OK, so maybe this time something disco/dance/synthpop. ;)
ZX Spectrum 48K (BEEPER). 9 channels of the Octode_3 engine (huge thanks to Introspec!!).
It took 2nd place in the Silly Venture 2014 BEEPER Music Compo.
As usual, recorded from real hardware, Timex Computer 2048.
